lead_paragraph: Capitalizing on two crashes that wiped out his last five rivals, Tom Boonen, the Belgian king of the cobblestone classics, rode in solitary splendor to his third victory in the Paris-Roubaix bicycle race on Sunday.
snippet: Capitalizing on two crashes that wiped out his last five rivals, Tom Boonen, the Belgian king of the cobblestone classics, rode in solitary splendor to his third victory in the Paris-Roubaix bicycle race on Sunday.
